annotations.summary: Patient presents with severe lower back pain for two months affecting daily activities.
Pain across entire lower back with radiation down the left leg.
Radiating pain usually stops at knee but occasionally extends to ankle.
Pain started two months ago after helping a friend move.
Baseline pain 5-6 out of 10, increases to 8 with bending or prolonged sitting.
Tingling and pins-and-needles sensation in left foot.
Managing with Tylenol, heating pad, and stretches with limited relief.
Sedentary office work with 8-10 hours daily sitting.
Back pain also affecting sleep quality.
